org.forgerock.openam.rest.resource

Class SSOTokenContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.services.context.AbstractContext
      • org.forgerock.openam.rest.resource.SSOTokenContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SubjectContext, org.forgerock.services.context.Context
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminSubjectContext

    public class SSOTokenContext
extends org.forgerock.services.context.AbstractContext
implements SubjectContext
    CREST context that provides a convenience method for getting hold of the caller as an authenticated subject based on the OpenAM SSO Token associated with the request.
    Since:
    12.0.0

      Guice factory for SSOTokenContext instances

                            throws SSOException
        Obtain an SSOToken from a Context.
        Parameters:
        context - The context. Must contain a SecurityContext.
        Returns:
        The SSOToken.
        Throws:
        SSOException - If the token could not be obtained.
